arts.ttl: Manchester City vs Burnley: Premier League preview, Gameweek 6, 2025
arts.sum: Burnley's defence will need to be on top of their game to keep Manchester City at bay and to give themselves a chance of walking away from the Etihad with any points. Meaning Kyle Walker will be making a return to the Etihad stadium this time as an opposition player as he looks likely to reclaim his right back spot.

arts.ttl: Pre-match analysis: Manchester City vs Burnley
arts.sum: The issue with doing this will be that City will have secondary runners off of Haaland, so the Burnley midfield will need to be switched on and wary to track these deep late runs into their penalty area. Much like the Liverpool game, Burnley will need everyone on the pitch to do their defensive duties.
